fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Use 1 bee to learn a player's subalignment. If it's a Full Moon, learn their alignment as well.
- Use 2 bees to roleblock a player. If it's a Full Moon, you may redirect them to a player of your choice instead.
- Use 3 bees to grant all Were members Powerful defense tonight. If it's a Full Moon, prevent all negative visits to Were members tonight instead.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
